original_text: I will hurl you and the mother who gave you birth into another country, where neither of you was born, and there you both will die.
korean_text: 내가 너와 너를 낳은 어머니를 너희가 나지 아니한 다른 지방으로 쫓아내리니 너희가 거기에서 죽으리라

sentences.original_text: and the mother who gave you birth
where neither of you was born,
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳은 너희 중 누구도 태어나지 않은 곳이며,

sentences.original_text: and there you both will die.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그곳에서 너희 둘 다 죽을 것이다.
